thread.title: Wendy's Is Trolling Everyone On Twitter And It's Great
thread.title_full: Wendy's Is Trolling Everyone On Twitter And It's Great

author: Mark Pygas
title: Wendy's Is Trolling Everyone On Twitter And It's Great
text:
Wendy's Twitter account has been on fire since their absolutely savage to a guy who said their burgers were frozen went viral earlier this week . They're done putting up with your nonsense, and they're not afraid to show it.
1.
@_inkedSnowFlake pic.twitter.com/IhRsonIUnJ 
— Wendy's (@Wendys) January 3, 2017 

2.
@Amadxus Well, our beef is fresh
— Wendy's (@Wendys) January 4, 2017

— Wendy's (@Wendys) January 3, 2017
